H3.text: when did refrigerator perry play for the bears. 1985 -- 1993

A4.text: In 1985, he was selected in the first round of the 1985 NFL draft by the Chicago Bears.

A5.text: Perry played for ten years in the NFL, retiring after the 1994 season.
